channel.title: BLACK MESA - THE BAND
channel.description:
Hello all.
I've been a follower of the mod for some time now, but have never posted on these forums before. I'm a music student studying in Essex, UK, and with my fellow college band mates we have performed under the name 'Black Mesa' for almost a year now.
Our music is largely unconnected with the Half-Life series, although we do have a song titled 'Headcrab'. We hoped that you guys might be able to indulge in our auditory wares. You can watch a whole set of ours that we performed recently here:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXiGg7ZjIyk']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXiGg7ZjIyk[/url]
We'd love to know what you think. All criticism welcome! As musicians we need to know what we can improve on :slight_smile:
You can find us on facebook here:
[url='https://www.facebook.com/Black.Mesa.Band.Page']https://www.facebook.com/Black.Mesa.Band.Page[/url]
And on our website here:
[url='https://black-mesa-band.webs.com/']https://black-mesa-band.webs.com/[/url]
P.S - I ought to mention our genre of music (although I dislike labels). We have melded Progressive Metal, Rock, Funk, Jazz and Rap together. Or something to that effect!

item.title: BLACK MESA - THE BAND
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Buzvonlurt:

Thanks very much for the kind words and feedback

Music nowadays is so diverse and bands so unique there’s really no way to give any feedback whatsoever, it’s all subjective. While I like experiments with multiple themes in one song, others call it a cacophony. That and the lack of any musical education keeps me from expressing my thoughts on a level deeper than the usual ‘like/don’t like’. Nevertheless, you’re welcome, I guess.

Buzvonlurt:

We are influenced by a number of bands, a short list would be; Alice in Chains, Tool, Porcupine Tree, Alter Bridge, Primus, Black Sabbath, Nirvana, Rage Against The Machine, Opeth and RHCP.

Thanks. This is actually an interesting selection. While it does make perfect sense, I must admit, there are some names I didn’t quite expect.

Buzvonlurt:

I’m hoping to get into the college studio tomorrow to mix a few of our tracks, so will post them here when I have some mp3’s available

No sweat. You’d never guess, I know, but I’m not short on patience.

P.S. Good thing you included that P.S. in OP. I’m used to seeing electronic music posted here almost exclusively so I was about to skip the thread. I actually did a double take at that last line.

Read full topic
